name: Ring Master
description:
Casual high-score arcade fun. Take on the role of a ring leader with the heart of a lion. Soar through the infinite rings.

Ring Master
Created by ZLJ
7 October 2016

Entry for GameBoyJam5

Fly through the shining rings.
Fly through 3 to gather dash energy.

Dark rings can be destroyed by dashing.
Dark rings will age into shining invincible dark rings if not destroyed.

Controls
Use Left/Right Arrows to turn.
Use Up Arrow to dash through dark rings.
Use Down Arrow to retry.
Use F4 to switch modes.
Use Esc to close this window/close program.
